src:
Trčila v žensko in njeno vnukinjo
04 Nov 2019, 12:51 by Spletno uredništvo

Voznica osebnega avtomobila je v nedeljo okrog poldneva na Markovcu v Kopru vozila vzvratno po parkirišču na Beblerjevi ulici in zavijala levo na cesto. V tem trenutku sta dovozno cesto prečkali ženska in njena triletna vnukinja. Voznica ju ni videla in je trčila vanju, da sta padli. Obe je takoj odpeljala v bolnišnico na pregled. Glede na težo poškodb sledi ustrezen ukrep.



Foto: Daniel Novakovic/STA

PRIMORSKA > Na počivališču Ravbarkomanda je nekdo vozniku iz Slovenj Gradca iz odklenjenega vozila ukradel mobilni telefon samsung galaxy S7, vreden 400 evrov.
Nasilen do partnerke
Izolski policisti so nasilnemu moškemu izrekli ukrep prepovedi približevanja partnerki, sledi mu kazenska ovadba.
Pakistanec v ukradenem avtomobilu
Policisti so v četrtek popoldan na cesti za Sviščake ustavili osebni avto ford kuga, ki ga je vozil 31-letni Pakistanec. Pri preverjanju v Italiji so ugotovili, da je vozilo prijavljeno kot ukradeno v Milanu. Pakistanca so s kazensko ovadbo privedli k preiskovalnemu sodniku, ki je zanj odredil pripor.
Domačin na vrtu, tat v hiši
V Barižonih je nekdo vstopil v hišo domačina, ki je bil medtem na vrtu, in mu ukradel 260 evrov iz denarnice.
Vlomilci na pohodu
V Senožečah je nekdo vlomil v stanovanjsko hišo, vendar ni ničesar odnesel. Medtem ko je bil v hiši, se je namreč vrnil lastnik, vlomilec pa je pobegnil.
Nekdo je vlomil v hišo v Hrpeljah in lastnikom odnesel 1000 evrov.
V Postojni je nekdo vlomil v hišo, vendar ni ničesar odnesel.
V petek ponoči so vlomili v hišo v Mali Bukovici, od koder so ukradli nekaj denarja in zlatnino.
V Sežani so vlomili v stanovanjsko hišo. Odnesli so nekaj hrvaških kun, dve ročni uri in zlato verižico. Škode je za 10.000 evrov.
Za volanom brez izpita
35-letnemu vozniku iz Sežane so piranski policisti v petek zasegli osebni avto, ker nima veljavnega vozniškega dovoljenja. Sledi mu obdolžilni predlog.
Popoldan so v Orehku zasegli osebni avto domačinu, ker nima veljavnega vozniškega dovoljenja. Sopotniku, ki je med postopkom pijan kršil javni red in mir, pa so odredili pridržanje. Prvemu sledi obdolžilni predlog, drugemu pa plačilni nalog.
23-letnemu Koprčanu so v Portorožu zasegli moped, ker prav tako nima veljavnega vozniškega dovoljenja. Tudi njemu sledi obdolžilni predlog.
V Orehku so v soboto popoldan zasegli osebni avto 54-letnemu domačinu, ki nima vozniškega dovoljenja. Sledi mu obdolžilni predlog.
Pijan kričal in žalil družinske člane
V petek ob 22. uri so policisti intervenirali v Kopru, kjer je moški kričal na družinske člane in jih žalil. Pijan s kršitvijo ni prenehal niti po prihodu policistov na kraj, zato so mu odredili pridržanje. Sledi plačilni nalog.
Trčil in pobegnil
Ob 23.25 je na cesti Šared - Korte v prijaviteljev avto trčil voznik osebnega avtomobila, zatem pa odpeljal naprej. Prijavitelj je zapeljal za njim, ta se je ustavil v Kortah, nato pa ponovno odpeljal. Policisti so ustavili 43-letnega domačina, ki ne poseduje vozniškega dovoljenja. Preizkus alkoholiziranosti je pokazal 1,12 miligrama alkohola v litru izdihanega zraka. Vozilo so zasegli, sledi obdolžilni predlog.
Našli zapuščeni kolesi
V Pliskovici pri cerkvi so našli dve zapuščeni kolesi, in sicer kolo nakamura in kolo terrana, ki nista prijavljeni kot ukradeni. Lastnika še iščejo.
Sirec po nesreči taval po Škofijah
V nedeljo ob 9.20 je policiste poklical domačin in povedal, da po Spodnjih Škofijah hodi mlajši moški in si nekaj ogleduje. Policisti so na kraju izsledili 21-letnega Sirca z urejenim statusom v Nemčiji. Ugotovili so, da je pred tem imel prometno nesrečo. Pri sebi je imel ključe vozila, nima pa vozniškega dovoljenja. Vozilo so mu zasegli, sledi mu obdolžilni predlog za vožnjo brez vozniškega dovoljenja in za pobeg s kraja prometne nesreče.
Mladoletnica za volanom brez izpita
Pred vasjo Cepki pri Kopru so policisti ustavili osebni avto, ki ga je vozila še mladoletna voznica brez vozniškega dovoljenja, vozilo pa je last očeta. Avto so ji zasegli, sledi ji obdolžilni predlog.
Kradljivi štopar
Danes ponoči, malo pred 2. uro, je Bolgar v Bertokih ustavil štoparju in ga odpeljal v bližino veterinarske postaje v Kopru, kjer ga je odložil. Med vožnjo mu je moški ukradel torbico, v kateri je imel osebne dokumente. Oškodovan je za 400 evrov.
Našli ukraden skuter
Danes zjutraj so policisti pri Kopru odkrili skuter piaggio, bele barve, registrskih številk KP 3H-Z2, ki je beležen kot ukraden 24. oktobra v Izoli.
text:
She ran into a woman and her granddaughter
04 Nov 2019, 12:51 by Web Editing

The driver of the passenger car drove back around the parking lot on Bebler Street around noon on Markovac in Koper on Sunday and turned left onto the road. At that moment, a woman and her three-year-old granddaughter were crossing the driveway. The driver did not see them and collided with them so that they fell. She was immediately taken to the hospital for examination. Depending on the severity of the injuries, the appropriate action is taken.



Photo: Daniel Novakovic / STA

PRIMORSKA> At the rest area of Ravbarkomanda, a driver from Slovenj Gradec stole a $ 400 samsung galaxy S7 mobile phone from an unlocked vehicle.
Violent to partner
Isolated police officers have imposed a measure of restraining order against a violent man, followed by a criminal complaint.
Pakistani in a stolen car
On Thursday afternoon, police officers stopped a Ford Kuga passenger car driven by a 31-year-old Pakistani man on the road to Sviščaki. A check in Italy found that the vehicle was reported stolen in Milan. The criminal was brought to the investigating magistrate with a criminal complaint, ordering him into custody.
The host in the garden, the thief in the house
In Barižoni, someone entered the home of a local resident in the garden and stole $ 260 from his wallet.
Burglars on the hike
In Senozeče, someone broke into an apartment building but didn't take anything away. While he was in the house, the owner returned and the burglar fled.
Someone broke into a house in Hrpelje and took the owners $ 1,000.
In Postojna, someone broke into a house but didn't take anything away.
On Friday night, they broke into a house in Mali Bukovica, where they stole some money and gold.
In Sežana, they broke into an apartment building. They took away some Croatian kuna, two wristwatches and a gold chain. Damage is for 10,000 euros.
Behind the wheel without an exam
A 35-year-old driver from Sežana was seized by a Piran police car on Friday because he did not have a valid driver's license. This is followed by the indictment.
In the afternoon, a car was seized in Orehok by a local man because he did not have a valid driver's license. However, a passenger who had been in breach of public order and peace during the trial was ordered detained. The first is followed by a charge sheet and the second by a payment order.
A 23-year-old Koprcani man was seized in a moped in Portorož because he also did not have a valid driver's license. He is also followed by an indictment.
A car was seized in Orehok on Saturday afternoon by a 54-year-old resident who does not have a driver's license. This is followed by the indictment.
Drunkenly screaming and insulting family members
On Friday at 10pm, police intervened in Koper, where a man yelled at family members and insulted them. The drunk with the violation did not stop even after the officers arrived at the scene, so he was ordered detained. The payment order follows.
He ran and ran away
At 11.25pm, the driver of the passenger car collided on the applicant's car on the Šared - Korte road and then drove on. The applicant drove behind him, stopped at Kortah, then drove again. Police officers stopped a 43-year-old homemaker who does not hold a driver's license. The alcohol test showed 1.12 milligrams of alcohol per liter of exhaled air. The vehicle was seized, followed by a charge sheet.
Found abandoned bikes
Two abandoned bicycles were found in Pliskovica near the church, namely the Nakamura bike and the Terran bike, which were not reported stolen. They are still looking for the owner.
The poor man wandered across the Dioceses by accident
On Sunday at 9.20 a police officer called a police officer and said that a younger man was walking through the Lower Dioceses and was looking at something. Police officers tracked down a 21-year-old Syrian man with regular status in Germany. They found out he had a car accident before. He had the vehicle keys with him, but did not have a driver's license. The vehicle was seized, followed by a charge of driving without a driver's license and fleeing the scene of a car accident.
A minor behind the wheel without an exam
In front of the village of Cepki near Koper, police stopped a passenger car driven by an underage driver without a driver's license and the vehicle owned by his father. The car was seized, followed by a charge sheet.
A thief's stopper
At night, shortly before 2am, Bolgar stopped at a stop in Bertoki and took him to a veterinary station in Koper, where he was put away. While driving, a man stole his purse containing his ID. He was fined $ 400.
Found a scooter stolen
This morning, police officers in Koper discovered a Piaggio scooter, white, of registration number KP 3H-Z2, which was reported stolen on 24 October in Izola.
